table_description: The purpose of this table is to record a daily snapshot of the firms daily positions along with PL (Profit and Loss), Attribution, Exposure, Alpha and advisor tags and other factors. There are 4 funds in the firm Rockhampton, Yaraka, RPA and Canoonan, with the following respective codes RH, YA, LR and CA. Some columns like Attribution, Alpha, SectorAlpha and Exposure are prefixed with the fund codes. Unless a value column augmentd with _USD the value is assumed to be in JPY. Some performance indicators: TPX Sector Alpha: Attribution - (Exposure * TPX Sector return), Alpha: Attribution - (Exposure * Beta * TPX return), Outperformance (Outperform/OP): Attribution - (Exposure * TPX return). If side is S then values will need to be multiplied by -1 if calculating the net but not for gross. If someone asked what is the attribution, alpha or exposure without specifying fund, the values per fund should be returned. If someone mentions (fund) RPA they are referring to LR.

table_description: This table stores individual instrument information. Most of the instruments are single stocks/equities. There are also indices and baskets. There are a few foreign keys pointing to different tables including exchangeID (hkg02p.t02Exchange.exchangeID), currencyID (hkg02p.t02Currency.currencyID), indexID (hkg02p.t07Index.indexID). The InstrumentID is local unique primary key. There are other unique identifiers tied to vendors or exchanges including quick, isin, sedol, enfusionInstrumentID. The table also contains other static data such as GIC (GICS sector), TPX (Topix sector), lotsize and instrument name. This table is joined to other tables to get more information about the instrument

table_columns.name: instrumentID
table_columns.description: The primary ID of this instrument. Used to join with other tables to get Instrument information

table_columns.name: enfusionInstrumentID
table_columns.description: The primary ID of this instrument in the Enfusion System

table_columns.name: companyID
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: exchangeID
table_columns.description: Foreign Key into the hkg02p.t02Exchange table which contains information on the trading exchange this instrument is traded on

table_columns.name: currencyID
table_columns.description: Foreign Key into the hkg02p.t02Currency table which contains information on the currency this instrument is traded in

table_columns.name: indexID
table_columns.description: Foreign Key into the hkg02p.t07Index table which contains information on the index this instrument is included in

table_columns.name: instrumentCode
table_columns.description: The instrument code which is equivalent to the exchange code + the country code. For Japanese Instruments equities the country code is dropped

table_columns.name: quick
table_columns.description: same as the instrument code. For Japanese Instruments equities this is the quick code or exchange code. For non Japan single stocks this is the same as the exchange code with the country code

table_columns.description: The 12 digit ISIN identifier

table_columns.description: Same as the 'name'/'longName' columns

table_columns.description: Short version of the company (English) name

table_columns.name: longName
table_columns.description: The name of the (English) company. Same as the 'name' column

table_columns.name: groupName
table_columns.description: The topix sector group name

table_columns.name: TPX
table_columns.description: The topix sector group name. For Stock baskets this is set to 'Stock Basket'

table_columns.name: GICS
table_columns.description: The GICs sector name. For Stock baskets this is set to 'Stock Basket'

table_columns.name: BroadSector
table_columns.description: The GICs broad sector name

table_columns.name: SubSector
table_columns.description: The GICs subsector name

table_columns.name: lotSize
table_columns.description: The trading lot size of the instrument

table_columns.name: priceMultiplier
table_columns.description: The trading lotsize multiplied by the contract size. Use this for Commoditiy futures and futures to compute the notional of the contract

table_columns.name: instrumentType
table_columns.description: The type of instrument. CB: Convertable Bond, CM: Commodity future, EQ: Equity or Stock Baskets, FU: Future or Future option, OP: Option, GOV: Government bond

table_columns.name: firstDate
table_columns.description: The first date that this instrument was traded on the exchange

table_columns.name: priority
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: delayPrice
table_columns.description: A flag which is set when stocks should use a delayed price for the end of day price. Mostly used for European and US instruments

table_columns.name: lupdate

table_columns.name: luser
table_columns.description: The username who updated this entry

table_columns.name: status
table_columns.description: I: If the instrument is inactively being updated. A: if the instrument is being activately updated

table_description: A table which holds a list of work days and their respective previous work days for different countries. Weekends and public holidays in the respective countries are skipped. This is to be used to calculate the previous work day for a given country. There are also a few flags to indicate if the day is the start or end of the month or week.

table_columns.name: workDayID
table_columns.description: The primary unique ID

table_columns.name: workday
table_columns.description: The work day date

table_columns.name: prevWorkDay
table_columns.description: The previous work day date

table_columns.name: countryID
table_columns.description: A Foreign Key into the hkg02p.t07Country table

table_columns.name: endOfMonth
table_columns.description: A Flag indicating if this date is the end of the month or not

table_columns.name: startOfMonth
table_columns.description: A Flag indicating if this date is the start of the month or not

table_columns.name: endOfWeek
table_columns.description: A Flag indicating if this date is the end of the week or not

table_columns.name: startOfWeek
table_columns.description: A Flag indicating if this date is the start of the week or not

table_description: Contains daily foreign exchange rates between 2 currencies. The base currency is the currency which the rate is denoted in. The quote currency is the currency which the rate is relative to. For example if the base currency is JPY and the quote currency is USD then the rate is the numer of JPY per USD.

table_columns.name: dailyCrossRateID
table_columns.description: The primary unique ID

table_columns.name: priceDate
table_columns.description: The reference date of this rate

table_columns.name: base
table_columns.description: The base currency (denoted by 3 letters). The currency in the denominator

table_columns.name: quote
table_columns.description: The quote currency (denoted by 3 letters). The currency in the numerator

table_columns.name: rate
table_columns.description: The foreign exchange (FX) rate.

table_columns.name: crdate
table_columns.description: The creation date of this entry in the database

table_description: Contains daily Trades of instruments done by the firm via Enfusion. Enfusion is the firm's OMS. Each entry is an individual trade with execution details. Trades are aggreated into positions. Position information is stored in other tables including t05PortfolioResponsibilities, t05PortfolioPositionCCY, t05PortfolioPosition

table_columns.name: tradeID
table_columns.description: The primary ID

table_columns.name: orderID
table_columns.description: The Order ID in Enfusion.

table_columns.name: bbgTicketNumber
table_columns.description: The order ID in Enfusion. (same as Order ID)

table_columns.name: insertDate
table_columns.description: Timestamp of when the trade was done

table_columns.name: portfolioID
table_columns.description: The ID of the portfolio. 1 = Rockhampton(RH), 2 = Yaraka(YA), 3 = RPA(RPA), 16 = Canoona(CA)

table_columns.name: instrumentID
table_columns.description: The instrumentID. Foreign Key into the t01Instrument table

table_columns.name: fundCode
table_columns.description: The Fund unique code

table_columns.name: code
table_columns.description: the instrument Code of the trade. Same as instrumentCode/Quick in the t01Instrument table

table_columns.name: bbgTicker
table_columns.description: The Bloomberg Ticker of the instrument

table_columns.name: name
table_columns.description: The English name of the instrument

table_columns.name: CBBGID
table_columns.description: The CBBGID identifier

table_columns.name: BBGID
table_columns.description: The BBGID identifier

table_columns.name: orderType
table_columns.description: The Order Type. B for Buy, S for Sell

table_columns.name: AIMTradeType
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: limitPrice
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: TIF
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: side
table_columns.description: Trade Side: L for Long, S for Short

table_columns.name: processDate
table_columns.description: The date the trade was processed on

table_columns.name: tradeDate
table_columns.description: The trade date of the trade. Trades are usually settled 2 days after the trade date

table_columns.name: settleDate
table_columns.description: The settlement date of the trade

table_columns.name: settleCurrency
table_columns.description: The currency that the trade is settled in.

table_columns.name: SSBorrowRate
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: spotFXRate
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: CCY
table_columns.description: The Currency the instrument price is denominated in

table_columns.name: totalRequested
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: requested
table_columns.description: Total quantity requested in the order

table_columns.name: quantity
table_columns.description: The actual quantity traded. Should be equal or less than in size to the 'requested'

table_columns.name: price
table_columns.description: The Price the trade was done at. The average price

table_columns.name: gross
table_columns.description: The Notional amount paid for the trade. Equals price multiplied by quantity

table_columns.name: brokerCommission
table_columns.description: The commision paid to the broker for the trade. Should be equal to the gross multiplied by the brokerCommissionRate

table_columns.name: brokerCommissionRate
table_columns.description: The broker commision rate

table_columns.name: clearingFee
table_columns.description: The fee incured to clear the trade

table_columns.name: otherCommissionTaxAndFees
table_columns.description: Other fees including taxes, commissions etc.

table_columns.name: totalCommission
table_columns.description: The total commission paid. Equals the brokerCommission + other CommissionTaxAndFees

table_columns.name: net
table_columns.description: The total paid for the trade. Equals the gross + totalCommission

table_columns.name: brokerCode
table_columns.description: The code of the Broker this trade was done with

table_columns.name: softBrokerCode
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: FIXBrokerCode
table_columns.description: The Broker code for FIX transactions

table_columns.name: AIMBrokerCode
table_columns.description: The AIM code for FIX transactions

table_columns.name: comment
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: swap

table_description: Contains daily positions per portfolio at the instrument level. Positions are a daily snapshot of the portfolio at the instrument level

table_columns.description: The primary unique ID

table_columns.name: portfolioID
table_columns.description: The ID of the portfolio. 1 = Rockhampton(RH), 2 = Yaraka(YA), 3 = RPA(RPA), 16 = Canoona(CA)

table_columns.name: instrumentID
table_columns.description: The instrumentID. Foreign Key into the t01Instrument table

table_columns.name: processDate
table_columns.description: The date the position was processed on

table_columns.name: quantity
table_columns.description: The position quantity

table_columns.name: localbase
table_columns.description: The denomination of the position. Either LOCAL or BASE. BASE can be either JPY or USD.

table_columns.name: CCY
table_columns.description: The currency which the price, commission and net are converted to

table_columns.name: price
table_columns.description: The market price of the instrument as of the processDate

table_columns.name: gross
table_columns.description: Not Used

table_columns.name: commission
table_columns.description: The commission incurred on the position denominated in the 'CCY' currency

table_columns.name: net
table_columns.description: The net amount incurred for this position denominated in the 'CCY' currency

table_columns.name: side
table_columns.description: The position side. L for Long, S for Short

table_columns.name: equityType
table_columns.description: The type of position. EQ for equities and equity baskets, FU for futures including future options, CM for commodities futures. DIV for dividend

table_columns.name: broker
table_columns.description: The broker this position was made with

table_columns.name: PB
table_columns.description: The Prime Broker with which this position is with

table_columns.name: swap
table_columns.description: Flag indicating whether this trade is a SWAP trade or not. Swap trades are have value SWAP

table_columns.name: lupdate
table_columns.description: A timestamp when this entry was updated in the DB
